001package org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.Address;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.Coin;
005import org.bitcoinj.base.Network;
006import org.bitcoinj.core.TransactionOutput;
007import org.bitcoinj.params.BitcoinNetworkParams;
008import org.bitcoinj.script.Script;
009
010/**
011 * Raw, immutable data for a transaction output
012 */
013public interface TransactionOutputData {
014    Coin amount();
015    Script scriptPubKey();
016
017    static TransactionOutputData of(Address address, Coin amount) {
018        return new TransactionOutputAddress(amount, address);
019    }
020
021    static TransactionOutputData fromTxOutput(TransactionOutput out) {
022        return new TransactionOutputDataScript(
023                out.getValue(),
024                out.getScriptPubKey());
025    }
026
027    default TransactionOutput toMutableOutput(Network network) {
028        return new TransactionOutput(BitcoinNetworkParams.of(network), null, amount(), scriptPubKey().getProgram());
029    }
030}
